messages.message:
UPDATE:

Based on replies in the original thread:
The dialogue box pictured (when attempting to delete an organization) is a `NOOP` type to inform the user that they need to reach out to `<mailto:admin@instabase.com|admin@instabase.com>` in to delete their org.

I believe this means the top-level message for the dialogue box is misleading, and should be changed to something informative rather than inquisitive (ex. "Please reach out to an administrator....")
